headline: Is FICO’s (FICO) GPU-Powered Xpress Upgrade Quietly Rewiring Its Long-Term Moat In Analytics?
summary: Earlier in January 2026, FICO released version 9.8 of its FICO Xpress Optimization suite, integrating NVIDIA CUDA-X libraries to accelerate its hybrid gradient algorithm and delivering much faster solutions for extremely large, dense optimization problems on supported NVIDIA GPUs. This move pushes FICO Xpress further into high-performance computing, widening its appeal for organizations tackling massive, complex optimization workloads across data-intensive operations. Next, we’ll examine how...
